title: Citi Third Quarter 2022 Earnings Review
summary: New York — Citigroup will issue its third quarter results via press release at approximately 8 a.m. (ET) on Friday, October 14, 2022. At 11 a.m. (ET), results will be reviewed via live webcast and teleconference.
tag-2: New York – Citigroup will issue its third quarter results via press release at approximately 8 a.m. (ET) on Friday, October 14, 2022. At 11 a.m. (ET), results will be reviewed via live webcast and teleconference.
tag-3: The press release, webcast and presentation materials will be available at www.citigroup.com/global/investors. A replay and transcript of the webcast will be available shortly after the event.
tag-4: To attend the live webcast please visit https://www.veracast.com/webcasts/citigroup/webinars/KG34HX.cfm.
tag-5: If you'd like to dial into the live earnings review, please call (800) 343-1703 (for U.S. and Canada callers) or (203) 518-9859 (for international callers).
tag-6: A telephonic replay of the call will be available approximately two hours after the event until October 22, 2022, by calling (800) 839-5687 (for U.S. and Canada callers) or (402) 220-2569 (for international callers).
tag-7: CitiCiti is a preeminent banking partner for institutions with cross-border needs, a global leader in wealth management and a valued personal bank in its home market of the United States. Citi does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions, providing corporations, governments, investors, institutions and individuals with a broad range of financial products and services.
tag-8: Additional information may be found at www.citigroup.com | Twitter: @Citi | YouTube: www.youtube.com/citi | Blog: http://blog.citigroup.com | Facebook: www.facebook.com/citi | LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/company/citi.
